text: I'm also confused by how long the generator step takes: <https://dev.azure.com/JuliaPackaging/Yggdrasil/_build/results?buildId=7875&view=logs&j=96c13d9d-dfd2-51e5-2f76-4a0b3ce09abc&t=09532434-8b0a-5f0e-118d-a3181cde5ec8>  the repo is cached, it needs only to fetch the recent commits.  why does it take so long?
